thread.title: Coca Cola bottlers agree three-way €28bn mega deal
thread.title_full: Coca Cola bottlers agree three-way €28bn mega deal

author: Ashley Armstrong
title: Coca Cola bottlers agree three-way €28bn mega deal
text: Retail and Consumer Coca Cola bottlers agree three-way €28bn mega deal Coca-Cola Enterprises announces biggest European consumer deal for a century as it agrees to combine with Coca-Cola Iberian Partners and its German rival to create the world's biggest independent Coke bottler The deal will create the world's biggest independent bottler of Coke Photo: Alamy
